title: Can't play on the new client, can't lauch the old client
body:
When I try to launch the new client it just hangs on loading until windows auto-closes it ;(

http://i.imgur.com/LJ8QQRf.gif

replies.body:
Same here... the new client is retarded :| BibleThump

I knew I should have kept the legacy client, but my friend told me it's working just fine... RIP
